name: The Hurried King
description:
At the end of January, I participated in the Global Gam Jam 2022. It was my first Game Jam. I enjoyed it very much, and decided to create my first game.

Here's the result!

The Goal

In this game, you play a King who must finish each level as fast as possible.

The faster you go from the beginning door to the ending door, the better your score is.

The first levels are easy, but don't worry, Spikes and Monsters will soon get in your way to increase the difficulty.

Will you manage to get all the stars?

Well... Good luck!

Controls

You can change the controls, but by default:

  • Move with the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys
  • Jump with the Up Arrow key
  • Go down a platform with the Down Arrow key
  • Restart a level with the R  key
  • Pause the game with the Escape key
Installation

Simply download the executable file.

For Windows, download the .exe file; For Linux, download the .x86_64 file.

Then you're ready to go, click the executable file and enjoy the game.
